FAILED.HEADER: Es Tut Uns Leid !!! Diesmal nicht
FAILED.INFO: Sie verpasst, alle Perlen zu sammeln

MENU.RULE_1: There is no time limit.Take your time to accomplish your target.
MENU.RULE_2: There are 4 levels. There are several floating bowls in each level.
MENU.RULE_3: First level is started from sea level.
MENU.RULE_4: There are 3 pearls to be collected.
MENU.RULE_5: You need to reach level 4 to collect pearls.
MENU.RULE_6: Once you reach level 4 with at least one pearl then you won.
MENU.RULE_7: If you lose all the pearls before reaching level 4 then you loose.
MENU.RULE_8: You will get coins for collecting pearl in the bowl in each level.
MENU.RULE_9: In Hard mode, you'll get more coins.
MENU.RULE_10: In Easy mode, you'll get less coins.
MENU.RULE_11: There are free lives depending on difficulties.
MENU.RULE_12: There are 6 free lives in Easy mode.
MENU.RULE_13: There are 3 free lives in Hard mode.
MENU.RULE_14: If you fail to collect pearl in bowl then you can use life to get back lost pearl.
MENU.RULE_15: You'll earn coins on each level upgradation depending on your difficulty level.
MENU.RULE_16: There is 3 min time limit. You need to earn coins with collecting pearls as much as you can.
MENU.RULE_17: Other rules are same as above.
